subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Knicks and the Raptors have agreed in principle to a trade involving Andrea Bargnani, according to a person involved in the talks. The Knicks are offering Marcus Camby, Steve Novak and draft picks.
snippet: The Knicks and the Raptors have agreed in principle to a trade involving Andrea Bargnani, according to a person involved in the talks. The Knicks are offering Marcus Camby, Steve Novak and draft picks.
